Sql.query: insert into prn_reduccionred( prnredcodi, prnvercodi, prnredbarracp, prnredbarrapm, prnredgauss, prnredperdida, prnredfecha, prnredusucreacion, prnredfeccreacion, prnredusumodificacion, prnredfecmodificacion, prnrednombre, prnredtipo ) values( :prnredcodi, :prnvercodi, :prnredbarracp, :prnredbarrapm, :prnredgauss, :prnredperdida, :prnredfecha, :prnredusucreacion, :prnredfeccreacion, :prnredusumodificacion, :prnredfecmodificacion, :prnrednombre, :prnredtipo )

update prn_reduccionred set prnvercodi = :prnvercodi, prnredbarracp = :prnredbarracp, prnredbarrapm = :prnredbarrapm, prnredgauss = :prnredgauss, prnredperdida = :prnredperdida, prnredfecha = :prnredfecha, prnredusumodificacion = :prnredusumodificacion, prnredfecmodificacion = :prnredfecmodificacion, prnrednombre = :prnrednombre, prnredtipo = :prnredtipo where prnredcodi = :prnredcodi

select red.prnredcodi, TRIM(red.prnrednombre) Prnrednombre, red.prnredbarracp, TRIM(pra.gruponomb) Nombrecp, red.prnredbarrapm, TRIM(prb.gruponomb) Nombrepm, red.prnredgauss, red.prnredperdida, red.prnredtipo from prn_reduccionred red join pr_grupo pra on red.prnredbarracp = pra.grupocodi join pr_grupo prb on red.prnredbarrapm = prb.grupocodi join prn_version ver on red.prnvercodi = ver.prnvercodi where red.prnvercodi = {0} and (red.prnredtipo in {1} or '0' in {1}) order by red.prnrednombre asc

select ptomedicodi, ptomedibarranomb, ptomedidesc, grupocodibarra, case WHEN origlectcodi = 6 then 'P' || (CASE WHEN ptomedibarranomb is null then ptomedidesc else ptomedibarranomb END) else 'A' || (CASE WHEN ptomedibarranomb is null then ptomedidesc else ptomedibarranomb END) end Nombre from me_ptomedicion where grupocodibarra in ({0}) or '0' in '{0}'
delete from prn_reduccionred where prnredbarrapm = :reduccionred and prnvercodi = :version
delete from prn_reduccionred where prnredbarrapm = :barrapm and prnredbarracp = :barracp and prnvercodi = :version
select prnredbarrapm, sum(prnredgauss) prnredgauss from prn_reduccionred where prnvercodi = {0} and prnredbarrapm in ({1}) group by prnredbarrapm

select rr.prnredbarracp, rr.prnredbarrapm, rr.prnredgauss, rr.prnredperdida, pto.ptomedicodi from prn_version vr join prn_reduccionred rr on vr.prnvercodi = rr.prnvercodi and (vr.prnverestado = 'A') join me_ptomedicion pto on rr.prnredbarrapm = pto.grupocodibarra and (pto.ptomediestado = 'A') order by rr.prnredbarracp, rr.prnredbarrapm, pto.ptomedicodi

select distinct rd.prnredbarracp from prn_reduccionred rd join prn_version vr on rd.prnvercodi = vr.prnvercodi and (vr.prnverestado = 'A') join pr_grupo gr on rd.prnredbarracp = gr.grupocodi join eq_area ar on gr.areacodi = ar.areacodi and (ar.tareacodi = 1) join eq_arearel re on ar.areacodi = re.areacodi where re.areapadre = {0}
